description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: UNICEF Ethiopia signed Rolling Work Plans with its Government Implementing Partners for the first time in its history. The Rolling Work Plans (RWPs) have a two years timeframe allowing longer term sequencing of activities. The higher level strategic RWP activities will strengthen the focus on results and improve efficiency and effectiveness by reducing the time spent on work plan preparation. This will also improve monitoring and reporting as the core activities are consistent across all regions. | Status:Met | As-of Date:24/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of open spot check recommendations(61017)
